price: Au uwe na kitalu cha mitende na mizabibu, na utupitishie mito kati yake ikimiminika.
arabic: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٞ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَعِنَبٖ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا
footnotes: Au uwe nacho kitalu Makka cha mitende na mizabibu chenye kupita mito kati yake! (Kwa kujua kuwa ardhi ya Makka ni kavu haioti kitu.)

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aw takūna laka jannatun min nakhīlin waʿinabin fatufajjira al-anhāra khilālahā tafjīran
